dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, Kaley Cuoco, she's definitely, like, the highest-paid TV actress. Right? Like, hands down.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, Kaley Cuoco, she's definitely, like, the highest-paid T V actress. Right? Like, hands down.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sofia Vergara Her giant haul, which clocks in at 73% more than second-ranked Kaley Cuoco's $24.5 million, leads this year's ranking of the small screen's top earners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No. Absolutely not. What are you even talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No. Absolutely not. What are you even talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sofia Vergara. By a huge margin. Over $42 million, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sofia Vergara. By a huge margin. Over forty two dollars million, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The World's Highest-Paid Actresses 2018 1. Sofia Vergara Earnings: $42.5 million

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, really? But, I mean, Modern Family was, like, wrapping up, wasn't it? How'd she pull that off?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, really? But, I mean, Modern Family was, like, wrapping up, wasn't it? How'd she pull that off?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, well, it wasn't just the show. A ton of her money came from, uh, endorsements and licensing deals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, well, it wasn't just the show. A ton of her money came from, uh, endorsements and licensing deals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Modern Family star reigns supreme thanks not only to her salary from her role on the hit ABC comedy but also to a slew of endorsements and lucrative licensing deals, which make up nearly half of her payday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Endorsements? Like what, she's selling, like, cleaning products or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Endorsements? Like what, she's selling, like, cleaning products or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Not quite. Think SharkNinja Coffee, Rooms To Go furniture. Her manager basically said they're a "well-oiled machine" for that stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not quite. Think SharkNinja Coffee, Rooms To Go furniture. Her manager basically said they're a well-oiled machine for that stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Among them: coffee maker SharkNinja Coffee and furniture chain Rooms To Go. ... Our endorsement department is a well-oiled machine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's wild. So Cuoco was, like, second, though?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's wild. So Cuoco was, like, second, though?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 2. Kaley Cuoco $24.5 million Big Bang Theory

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but her earnings were almost entirely from Big Bang Theory. Not like Vergara's diversified portfolio.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but her earnings were almost entirely from Big Bang Theory. Not like Vergara's diversified portfolio.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By contrast, 95% of Cuoco's earnings can be attributed to her role on Big Bang Theory.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Didn't that cast, um, take a pay cut at some point? For, like, the others?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Didn't that cast, um, take a pay cut at some point? For, like, the others?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cuoco and her male co-stars took a pay cut, from an estimated $1 million an episode to $900,000 an episode, in an effort to free up cash for ranking newcomers Melissa Rauch (No. 6, $12 million) and Mayim Bialik (No. 6, $12 million).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They did. For Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik, yeah. Which, uh, is pretty rare.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They did. For Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik, yeah. Which, uh, is pretty rare.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cuoco and her male co-stars took a pay cut... in an effort to free up cash for ranking newcomers Melissa Rauch (No. 6, $12 million) and Mayim Bialik (No. 6, $12 million).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm. So who's after Cuoco, then? Ellen Pompeo from Grey's?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm. So who's after Cuoco, then? Ellen Pompeo from Grey's?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yep. She, like, really pushed for a big upfront fee and backend profits. Good for her.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep. She, like, really pushed for a big upfront fee and backend profits. Good for her.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Playing Meredith Grey for 15 seasons on Shonda Rhimes' Grey's Anatomy has allowed her to negotiate for a hefty upfront fee, a cut of the backend and a producer fee on spinoff Station 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And so, overall, are these TV salaries, like, still growing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And so, overall, are these T V salaries, like, still growing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, yeah. The top ten combined earnings actually increased from the previous year. So, more money swirling around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, yeah. The top ten combined earnings actually increased from the previous year. So, more money swirling around.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the world's 10 highest-paid TV actresses earned a combined $168.5 million between June 1, 2017, and June 1, 2018, up from $156.5 million in the same period last year.
